api/authentication.title: Authentication
api/authentication.description: To make requests to the Friendly Captcha API you need to prove who you are. You do this by passing an API key in a header.

api/endpoints/siteverify.title: /api/v2/siteverify
api/endpoints/siteverify.description: The siteverify endpoint is used to verify captcha responses. A captcha response is the value that is embedded in your form by the captcha widget when the challenge has been completed.

api/openapi.title: OpenAPI Specification
api/openapi.description: The OpenAPI Specification (OAS) of our endpoints can be downloaded here:

getting-started/client.title: Creating a sitekey
getting-started/client.description: Log in to the Dashboard and head to the Applications page.

getting-started/common-problems.title: Common problems
getting-started/common-problems.description: contact support if not listed here

getting-started/introduction.title: Introduction
getting-started/introduction.description: Friendly Captcha is a service that protects your websites and applications from automated abuse.

getting-started/siteverify.title: Verify the response
getting-started/siteverify.description: When the captcha challenge is completed by the user, the user's browser receives a piece of text that proves that they completed the challenge. This proof is called the response.

guides/migrating-from-hcaptcha.title: Migrating from hCaptcha
guides/migrating-from-hcaptcha.description: Switching from hCaptcha to Friendly Captcha is straightforward.

guides/migrating-from-recaptcha.title: Migrating from reCAPTCHA
guides/migrating-from-recaptcha.description: Switching from Google's reCAPTCHA (v2) to Friendly Captcha is straightforward.

guides/upgrading-to-v2/backend-integrati.title: Backend Integration
guides/upgrading-to-v2/backend-integrati.description: 1. Change the field name in your forms

guides/upgrading-to-v2/introduction.title: Introduction
guides/upgrading-to-v2/introduction.description: This guide describes how to upgrade from v1 to v2 of our widget.

guides/upgrading-to-v2/script.title: Client (CDN script)
guides/upgrading-to-v2/script.description: This guide runs you through the changes you will have to make when switching from version 1 to version 2 of the Friendly Captcha widget if you are using the script tags.

guides/upgrading-to-v2/why-upgrade.title: Why Upgrade?
guides/upgrading-to-v2/why-upgrade.description: With v2 we include learnings of (almost) 3 years of Friendly Captcha. This document outlines the reasons why you should switch to v2.

integrations/index.title: Integrations
integrations/index.description: Plugins and libraries allow you to implement Friendly Captcha into your product easily.

intro.title: Quick Start
intro.description: Friendly Captcha is a service that protects your websites and applications from automated abuse.

sdk/advanced/automated-testing.title: Automated Testing
sdk/advanced/automated-testing.description: Testing can be at odds with a captcha you add to your website or app. Perhaps you use automated testing tools like Cypress, Selenium, or Puppeteer.

sdk/advanced/browser-support.title: Browser support
sdk/advanced/browser-support.description: All modern browsers are supported, on both mobile and desktop, all releases up to at least 8 years old.

sdk/advanced/csp.title: Content Security Policy (CSP)
sdk/advanced/csp.description: Content Security Policy is a way to secure your website from cross-site scripting (XSS).

sdk/advanced/localization.title: Language Detection
sdk/advanced/localization.description: If your website is in German it makes sense to have the widget in German too.

sdk/configuration.title: Configuration
sdk/configuration.description: There are two ways you can configure the behavior of the widget.

sdk/events.title: Events
sdk/events.description: The captcha widget emits DOM events which allow you to write code that reacts to changes in the widget.

sdk/index.title: Overview
sdk/index.description: The SDK is the code you add to your website to display captcha widgets on your website.

sdk/lifecycle.title: Lifecycle
sdk/lifecycle.description: The widget has a fixed set of states it can be in.

what-is-friendly-captcha.title: What is Friendly Captcha?
what-is-friendly-captcha.description: Friendly Captcha is a system that protects websites from bots and abuse in a privacy-friendly and accessible way.
